subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alex Alexander Vinokourov, the Kazakh cyclist who failed a doping test before the Tour de France, has accused cycling authorities of violating his rights and vowed to clear his name.
snippet: Alex Alexander Vinokourov, the Kazakh cyclist who failed a doping test before the Tour de France, has accused cycling authorities of violating his rights and vowed to clear his name.
